title: blank login screen but has music
body: For some reason, I am unable to get into League because after opening League and clicking the Launch button, the login screen in completely blank with the music playing in the background. Can someone please help me.

replies.body: The black screen you see here is usually due to a network issue that's failing to connect to the server and download assets.  I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions!
i went over each step and nothing helped so i had to resolve it by uninstalling and the reinstalling.
